◆ fix_underflow()

void xdsp::util::fix_underflow ( double & d)
inline

Fixes possible underflows before casting double to float.
Used to prevent denormals on systems where they can cause issues.

Parameters
ddouble value to be corrected for possible underflow when cast to float

Definition at line 34 of file util.h.

34 {
35 typedef std::numeric_limits<float> flt;
36
37 const bool underflow_positive = d > 0.0 && d < flt::min();
38 const bool underflow_negative = d < 0.0 && d > -flt::min();
39
40 if (underflow_positive || underflow_negative) {
41 d = 0.0;
42 }
43}

const double sample_rate )
inline

Prewarp a frequency to be preserved in trapezoidal integration.
To be used with bilinear transformation, topology-preserving transformation, etc.

Parameters
freqFrequency to be preserved
sample_rateSample rate of the system
Returns
Prewarped frequency

Definition at line 87 of file util.h.

87 {
88 const double omega_d = consts::TWO_PI * freq;
89 const double fs2 = 2.0 * sample_rate;
90 const double omega_a = fs2 * tan(omega_d / fs2);
91
92 return omega_a;
93}

76 {
77 const float omega_d = (float)consts::TWO_PI * freq;
78 const float omega_a =
79 2.0f * sample_rate * tanf(omega_d / (2.0f * sample_rate));
